Trade/Device Name(s): cobas Cdiff nucleic acid test for use on the cobas Liat System
cobas Cdiff Nucleic Acid Test for use on the cobas Liat System
Regulation Name(s): Clostridium Difficile Toxin Gene Amplification Assay
Specimen Container(s): cobas PCR Media Swab Sample Kit
Method(s)/Technology(ies): Silica magnetic particle-based nucleic acid extraction
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for cobas Cdiff nucleic acid test on the cobas Liat System for qualitative detection of C. difficile toxin B gene in stool specimens using real-time PCR.
Indications for Use Summary: Automated, qualitative in vitro diagnostic test using real-time PCR for detection of toxin B (tcdB) gene of toxigenic Clostridioides difficile in unformed stool specimens from patients suspected of C. difficile infection, used as an aid in the diagnosis of CDI in conjunction with clinical and epidemiological risk factors.
